title: Create custom elements for the web.

name.description: The name of the custom element module.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the custom element module which will provide your elements?

barrel.description: The barrel in your workspace that contains the components you'd like to create as custom elements.
barrel.x-prompt: What's the barrel name in your workspace which contains the components to create as custom elements?

components.description: Comma delimited list of components from your barrel to create as custom elements.
components.x-prompt: Provide a comma delimited list of components from your barrel to create as custom elements.

skipPreviewApp.description: Skip creating the app files to preview your built custom elements.
skipPreviewApp.x-prompt: Would you like to skip creation of the preview app files?

prefix.description: A unique prefix to add to each custom element. Defaults to provided component selectors 'as is'.
